quote_last: on the twenty-fourth of December and Henry and I are on our way to Meadowlark House for Christmas. It’s a beautiful clear day, no snow here in Chicago, but six inches on the ground in South Haven.
title: The Time Traveler’s Wife
author: Audrey Niffenegger
